item.description:
We used to do a semi-regular Pub Trivia meet in the past, and we always had a good time (and often won!) I think it's about time to revive the tradition!

 

A place I like to go for trivia is Celtica on Long Wharf, they do it every Thursday. Trivia starts at 9pm, so I'm going to say we should shoot for 8:30 as a good start time. For those who haven't been to Celtica, there are normally plenty of spaces on Long Wharf across from the bar, so parking shouldn't be a problem. In my experience triva is wrapped up by 11, so it's not a super late night either.

 

I'm posting this for next week to give plenty of notice, but if anyone wants to go this week (1/31) let me know, because I'm always up for it!
item.name: Pub Trivia!
